title: PSX 2016 Predictions - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 63
description:
It's time for Greg, Colin, and Tim to come together and make 15 bold predictions for what we'll see Saturday at PSX. Plus, Final Fantasy XV impressions! (Released 11.29.16)

Thanks to our sponsor MVMT Watches! Get 15 percent off today —with free shipping and free returns — by going to http://mvmtwatches.com/love.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafun...

Get you PS I Love You XOXO shirts and posters: http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Listen to today's artist here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilnl94R0NoU&feature=youtu.be

Submit questions for the show here: http://www.kindafunny.com/psq

Greg and Colin are back with a weekly PlayStation podcast. Catch it on YouTube and podcast services each and every Tuesday at 9 a.m. PT!

Follow us on Twitter!

Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy

Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
